Consolia christmas cards

Some christmas cards I made for my webcomic, Consolia. 2017 had a felicitous Fell beast, 2018 a beautiful Balrog, 2019 a teasing T-Rex.

Want to contact me?

I'd love to hear from you. Whether it's weird questions, silly remarks, funny insults, or commissions of any of the aforementioned adjectives; all equally loved.

Reach me at tim@consolia-comic.com or use the twitters @timquax.
